short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Stack Overflow answers right from DevTools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This super useful extension ads a new tab to your DevTools.

You can search Stack Overflow questions right from that tab.

- Easy to use
- Shows complete answers and code snippets
- Key navigation:
   - Left-Right to switch between panes
   - Up-Down to move between questions
